review:
Dr Kusum is a thorough professional, well qualified, friendly, very organised, knowledgeable and meticulous in her work. 

Very much satisfied with the comprehensive treatment given ( full mouth rehabilitation with multiple crowns and veneers) , complete procedures, cost and the outcome is excellent and a perfect match to the original form, in fact and indeed mesmerising. 

Clinic is well established and equipped, technically sound, very hygienic and friendly staffs. 

Team at Smile Craft made me Smile Again. Thank you 
Dr Kusum üíêüíñüôè. 

Good wishes to you all.

review: Practo appointments are not honoured . Doctor has a seperate appointment list. Last priority is given to practo appointments. Had to wait for almost 2 hours from appointment time. Good experience earlier also visited the doctor for RCT treatment so overall good experience till now

review:

Only thing though it is not a major negative feedback is the cost for procedures are a bit higher side.

No proper documentation given, my claim got rejected as there were no doctor name given
reply_text: Good evening sir/ madam, we value your feedback. charges are calculated according to the materials and technology used. We give utmost care on quality of the treatment using all latest technology like microscope, intraoral scanner, full mouth xray facility and special attention given to hygiene and sterilization. Quality comes with cost you need to decide are you looking for quality or cost accordingly choose the clinic. Regards
